text: Jarasandh was king of Magadha. He was a cruel king. He was killed by Pandav son, Bhim. He was blessed with immense power by lord Bramha. Bhimsen defeated him in Malla yudh. He teared down his legs apart and threw in opposite direction to end Jarasandh life. Jarasandh had captured many princess of different kingdom which he had won the fight against. Lord Krishna had taken all those princesses as his consort. Category:Hindu mythology Category:Ancient India
title: Jarasandha
